imdb.plot outline: A royal family struggle amongst high powered and advanced beings on a planet called Gia, 200 years from Earth, cause's a war amongst siblings and marks Earth as the new battle ground. With the loss of his memory, the first half of the story is told through a royal guard and cousin to the siblings, Taylor. Taylor finds himself attending college with his family only to regain his memory and in a battle with an evil counterpart that wants nothing but the destruction of the world as his true identity is the Shadow Demon King. It's up to Reku and Josh to re-train Taylor and hope that he can vanquish the demon. With the second half, told through Reku's sister, and Taylor's wife, Sarah, even more battles await the family as they battle each other and gods. Who will survive...And who will die?
imdb.title: The Monster Within: The Chronicles of Sarah & Taylor
akas: The Monster Within: The Chronicles of Sarah & Taylor (United States)
plot: A royal family struggle amongst high powered and advanced beings on a planet called Gia, 200 years from Earth, cause's a war amongst siblings and marks Earth as the new battle ground. With the loss of his memory, the first half of the story is told through a royal guard and cousin to the siblings, Taylor. Taylor finds himself attending college with his family only to regain his memory and in a battle with an evil counterpart that wants nothing but the destruction of the world as his true identity is the Shadow Demon King. It's up to Reku and Josh to re-train Taylor and hope that he can vanquish the demon. With the second half, told through Reku's sister, and Taylor's wife, Sarah, even more battles await the family as they battle each other and gods. Who will survive...And who will die?::Richard Abel
